8fe06bf9-c890-4eb3-ac70-3a4ad3aa6738.description: The Learning Recovery and Enhancement Programme (Let’s REAP!) was designed to promote learning improvement in light of the challenges to education brought about by COVID-19. However, the programme also intends to address longer-standing issues which the pandemic has exacerbated, as well as to build the resilience of national education systems to the occurrence of other natural hazards (such as ﬂooding, hurricanes, and volcanic activity) prevalent in the OECS and CARICOM territories.
8fe06bf9-c890-4eb3-ac70-3a4ad3aa6738.name: Learning Recovery and Enhancement Programme

badge_template_activities.title: To earn the Learning Recovery and Enhancement Programme credentials (badge and certificate), participants must complete the three (3) modules, in addition to, a mandatory online orientation course. The three modules are: Educational Leadership and Accountability; Educational Assessment; and Communities of Practice.

4251e70f-4c04-4bd8-8db2-74b52c70a309.description: This badge represents successful completion of the Certificate Course in Effective Pedagogy in Distributed Teaching and Learning. The criteria for the issuing of this badge are completion of ALL graded assignments and achievement of Grade B (65%) or higher on all completed assignments.
4251e70f-4c04-4bd8-8db2-74b52c70a309.name: Effective Pedagogy in Distributed Teaching and Learning

issuer.summary: issued by Eastern Caribbean Joint Board of Teacher Education

entity.name: Eastern Caribbean Joint Board of Teacher Education

badge_template_activities.title: This 60-hour course consists primarily of online elements with potential for face-to-face support and was designed to help teachers to acquire knowledge, skills and competencies in effective pedagogies for teaching and learning in a distributed environment. Concepts such as theoretical foundations, planning for student-sensitive instruction, teaching and learning with technology, creative assessment, and teacher leadership are covered in the five modules of this course.
